title: Infinite bug splats and "you have been disconnected"
body:
Why is it that everytime i alt tab or load a game i have a 98.9% chance of bug splatting then i have to try reconnecting about 10 times just to be told i have no internet connection while i also happen to be in a voice call with friends and my internet connection is actually just fine? I made a post about this awhile ago and got no responses to it. And no its not a issue with my computer or internet. Im on a fresh copy of windows (yes this was happening before i reinstalled windows) and its definitly not a issue with my connection because im in voice calls and using the internet just like normal when this happens.

edit: its not just me either. It happens to my friends too.
edit 2: btw my record was 6 bug splats and 14 disconnected errors on attempting to reconnect in just one game.

r9 380
i-5 4460
8GB ram
100 download
10 up

replies.body:
Even though you were still in a voice call and your internet was working fine, it doesn't rule out the possibility that your network simply couldn't get a strong connection to our game servers for some reason. 

You may just need to update some of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure all the correct ports are open, but also be sure to go through the rest of the steps to cover all your bases. Hit me back up and let me know how that helps.
